doc.after: In 2007, more than 3,985,105Â visitors with 7,402,423Â overnight stays visited the city.[94] The tourism sector employs more than 175,000 people full-time and brings in revenue of â¬9.3 billion, making the tourism industry a major economic force in the Hamburg Metropolitan Region. Hamburg has one of the fastest-growing tourism industries in Germany. From 2001 to 2007, the overnight stays in the city increased by 55.2% (Berlin +52.7%, Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania +33%).[95]
